overview:
Jeff Such is Co-Founder & President of Stumpwise, a free all-in-one web platform for political campaigns and organizations of all sizes.

Jeff considers himself an accidental political entrepreneur. After organizing nationwide during the 2008 Presidential elections, he worked on down-ballot campaigns and learned firsthand that only the most well-funded candidates have access to the latest web technologies. He co-founded Stumpwise to correct that inequity and remove any barriers preventing direct communication between candidate/elected official and voter.

When heâ€™s not democratizing political technology, Jeff can be found outdoors skiing, hiking, or camping. He lives in San Francisco with his dog â€“ and home-state namesake â€“ Jersey.
